meanings.definition: Relating to the measurement of elevations on the earth's surface.
meanings.sent1: The hypsometric map showed the different elevations of the land.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used hypsometric data to analyze the mountain range.
meanings.sent3: The hypsometric measurements made the hill look like a giant staircase.
meanings.sent4: Her hypsometric calculations reached new heights of accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The hypsometric details painted a vivid picture of the terrain.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to hypsometry, the science of measuring elevations above sea level.
meanings.sent1: The hypsometric study focused on altitude variations in the region.
meanings.sent2: Hypsometric techniques helped in determining the height of the plateau.
meanings.sent3: The hypsometric experiment turned the mountain into a giant measuring stick.
meanings.sent4: His hypsometric approach provided a clear view of the elevation changes.
meanings.sent5: The hypsometric analysis revealed the true height of the peak.
